comments:
The Visual Editor project used the ICU4J plugin from the latest integration build. When opening VE exceptions are thrown and the editor fails to open.


Caused by: java.util.MissingResourceException: Could not find res_index
at com.ibm.icu.impl.ICUResourceBundle.createFullLocaleNameSet(ICUResourceBundle.java:987)
at com.ibm.icu.impl.ICUResourceBundle.access$3(ICUResourceBundle.java:983)
at com.ibm.icu.impl.ICUResourceBundle$AvailEntry.getFullLocaleNameSet(ICUResourceBundle.java:1044)
at com.ibm.icu.impl.ICUResourceBundle.getFullLocaleNameSet(ICUResourceBundle.java:678)
at com.ibm.icu.impl.ICULocaleService$ICUResourceBundleFactory.getSupportedIDs(ICULocaleService.java:534)
at com.ibm.icu.impl.ICULocaleService$LocaleKeyFactory.handlesKey(ICULocaleService.java:367)
at com.ibm.icu.impl.ICULocaleService$LocaleKeyFactory.create(ICULocaleService.java:351)
at com.ibm.icu.impl.ICUService.getKey(ICUService.java:463)
at com.ibm.icu.impl.ICUService.getKey(ICUService.java:383)
at com.ibm.icu.impl.ICULocaleService.get(ICULocaleService.java:72)
at com.ibm.icu.text.NumberFormatServiceShim.createInstance(NumberFormatServiceShim.java:88)
at com.ibm.icu.text.NumberFormat.getInstance(NumberFormat.java:1139)
at com.ibm.icu.text.NumberFormat.getInstance(NumberFormat.java:449)
at org.eclipse.ve.internal.propertysheet.MinmaxValidator.<clinit>(MinmaxValidator.java:62)
... 91 more

Thanks to Doug Felt for pointing this out, but the eclipse-SDK-I20060213-1200-win32.zip build had the ICU plugin without some files [com/ibm/icu/impl/data/icudt35b/coll/res_index.txt
com/ibm/icu/impl/data/icudt35b/rbnf/res_index.txt
com/ibm/icu/impl/data/icudt35b/res_index.txt
com/ibm/icu/impl/data/icudt35b/translit/res_index.txt
] built into it. Due to this exceptions were arising. In the latest integration build (eclipse-SDK-I20060216-2000-win32.zip), these files were present and VE worked fine. Hence closing the defect.
